name: Blipstar Store Locator
author: blipstar

sections.description:
Add a store locator to your WordPress powered site using Blipstar.

Embed your Blipstar-generated store locator using shortcode [blipstar id=”###”] where id is your unique Blipstar account id.

Go to the plugin info page
Based on the iframe plugin (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/iframe/)
sections.installation:
1. install and activate the plugin on the Plugins page
  2. click on the instructions link (shown at the top of the WordPress admin Dashboard)
sections.faq:
How do I create and set up my store locator?

Visit the Blipstar site

What do I need to type into my page for the store locator to appear?

Once you’ve created your store locator and are logged in to Blipstar, click here and it will tell you what the shortcode is.
sections.changelog:
1.0 – 2012-11-26

  • Initial release

1.1 – 2012-12-01

  • Updated to allow a map of all locations to be shown

1.2 – 2013-04-09

  • Allows use of curl if allow_url_fopen is set to false

1.3 – 2013-04-11

  • Allows use over secure (https) connections

short_description: Add a fully-customizable store locator to your WordPress site.
description:
Add a store locator to your WordPress powered site using Blipstar.

Embed your Blipstar-generated store locator using shortcode [blipstar id=”###”] where id is your unique Blipstar account id.

Go to the plugin info page
Based on the iframe plugin (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/iframe/)
